title: Women of the Mangue (Mulheres do Mangue) from Mangue
medium: Lithograph with hand additions from a portfolio with three woodcuts, one lithograph with hand additions and forty-two line block reproductions
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 13 x 9 5/8" (33 x 24.5 cm); sheet: 13 5/8 x 9 3/4" (34.6 x 24.8 cm)
